summary: Implements a graph attention convolution that uses dot‑product similarity between linearly transformed node features to compute attention coefficients and aggregate neighbor information, supporting multi‑head attention on both homogeneous and unidirectional bipartite graphs.
business_intent: Provide a reusable GNN layer for DGL that enables attention‑based message passing with configurable input/output dimensions, head count, and optional handling of zero‑in‑degree nodes, facilitating downstream graph learning tasks.
